title: Her Will, His Way
description: He seduced her with a dare but will he lose her with a lie?Antonio has loved Anita for as long as he can remember, but the only attention she’d give him was in willful response to a dare. Now that her marriage has failed, she’s returned to the valley to run her late grandfather’s flower shop.But, what Anita doesn’t know is that Antonio has made a ‘deal with the devil’ and he used the shop to lure her into more than just his bed.
author: Terri Molina
